course.subject: CSC
course.title: Advanced Certification in Computing
course.catalogDescription: This course provides an opportunity for students to prepare for professional certification exam at the advanced and expert levels while being tutored by a faculty member holding the certification they are seeking. Students will meet individually with their instructor to develop a study plan, review study materials, and make other preparations for the exam.

objectives.objective: Develop strategies for preparing and taking proctored certification exams
